languages.text: "Почему вы интересуетесь ксенотехнологиями? Разве это не ересь?"
"Why are you interested in xenotech? Isn't that heresy?"
languages.original_text: "Почему вы интересуетесь ксенотехнологиями? Разве это не ересь?"

traits.locale_text: "Why are you interested in xenotech? Isn't that heresy?"
"Why are you interested in xenotech? Isn't that heresy?"
"Why are you interested in xenotech? Isn't that heresy?"
"Why are you interested in xenotech? Isn't that heresy?"
"Why are you interested in xenotech? Isn't that heresy?"

languages.text: 「なぜ異星技術に興味がある？異端行為とみなされるのでは？」
languages.original_text: "Why are you interested in xenotech? Isn't that heresy?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ異星技術に興味がある？異端行為とみなされるのでは？」

languages.text: “你为什么对异形科技感兴趣？那不是异端邪说吗？”
languages.original_text: "Why are you interested in xenotech? Isn't that heresy?"

traits.locale_text: “你为什么对异形科技感兴趣？那不是异端邪说吗？”

languages.text: «¿Le interesa la xenotecnología? ¿No se considera herejía?».
languages.original_text: "Why are you interested in xenotech? Isn't that heresy?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Le interesa la xenotecnología? ¿No se considera herejía?».

languages.text: « Pourquoi vous intéressez-vous à la xénotechnologie ? N'est-ce pas une forme d'hérésie ? »
languages.original_text: "Why are you interested in xenotech? Isn't that heresy?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi vous intéressez-vous à la xénotechnologie ? N'est-ce pas une forme d'hérésie ? »

languages.text: "Warum seid Ihr an Xenotech interessiert? Ist das nicht Ketzerei?"
languages.original_text: "Why are you interested in xenotech? Isn't that heresy?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum seid Ihr an Xenotech interessiert? Ist das nicht Ketzerei?"

languages.text: "Zeno teknolojisiyle niye ilgilisiniz? Kâfirlik sayılmıyor mu?"
languages.original_text: "Why are you interested in xenotech? Isn't that heresy?"

traits.locale_text: "Neden zeno teknolojisiyle ilgileniyorsun? Kâfirlik olarak görmüyor musun?"
